name: Eye of Skadi
description: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

abilities.name: Cold Attack
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks apply a movement speed and attack speed slow on enemy units.
notes: The frigid attacks also reduce the effectiveness of healing and health restoration on the targets
The movement speed slow is more effective against ranged enemies
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration
Does not affect Buildings or Ward-type units
Weaker sources do not slow or reduce health restoration if a stronger source is present

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
The item's attributes grant additional health, mana, attack speed, armor, and attack damage bonuses
Item is purchasable at the Main Shop under Armor but assembled entirely with items from the Secret Shop
